text: Roofman is an upcoming American crime drama movie. It is expected to be released on October 3, 2025. It was directed by Derek Cianfrance and produced by Dylan Sellers, Chris Parker, Jamie Patricof, and Lynette Howell Taylor. The movie is based on a the real life former United States Army Reserve soldier Jeffrey Manchester as he goes on a robbing spree after breaking out of prison and hides from police in the roof of a Toys "R" Us. Principal photography began on October 24, 2024 in Gastonia, North Carolina and finished on December 12. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s crime movies Category:2020s drama movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Miramax movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Roofman (movie)
